long_desc.thetext:
13.1.1.1 / Static Semantics: Early Errors / group 2 / bullet 1,2 It is a Syntax Error if BoundNames of FormalParameterList contains ...
s|FormalParameterList|FormalParameters|
---
13.3.1.2 / R.S.: Property Definition Evaluation / group 1 / step 10 NormalCompletion(closure).
Italicize "closure". (= bug 753)
---
13.3.1.2 / R.S.: Property Definition Evaluation / group 4/ step 8 Let status be the result of DefinePropertyOrThrow(object, propName desc).
After "propName", insert comma. (= bug 1498)
---
13.4.1.2 / R.S.: EvaluateBody / group 1 / step 3 Let G be the of calling the result of calling the GetThisBinding ...
Delete "the of calling"
---
13.4.1.2 / R.S.: EvaluateBody / group 2 / step 4 Let startStatus be the result of GeneratorStart(G, Comprehension).
Change "be" to upright font.
---
13.4.1.2 / R.S.: Property Definition Evaluation / group 1 / step 6.a ... with arguments Method, StrictormalParameters, body, scope, and strict
s|Strictormal|StrictFormal|
---
13.4.1.2 / R.S.: Property Definition Evaluation / group 1 / step 11 Let status be the result of DefinePropertyOrThrow(object, propName desc).
After "propName", insert comma. (= bug 1498)
---
13.5.1.1 / Static Semantics: PrototypeMethodDefinitions / group 2 / step 5
Empty step.
